def sort_and_format_first_string(lst):
    sorted_lst = sorted(lst)
    first_string = sorted_lst[1]
    formatted_string = '***'.join(first_string)
    return formatted_string

def sort_and_format_first_string(lst):
    sorted_lst = sorted(lst)
    first_string = sorted_lst[-1]
    formatted_string = '***'.join(first_string)
    return formatted_string

def sort_and_format_first_string(lst):
